name: Murray
hint: Australia's longest river, flowing from the Australian Alps to the Southern Ocean in South Australia

name: Darling
hint: Australia's longest river when measured to its farthest headwater, a major tributary of the Murray

name: Murrumbidgee
hint: A major tributary of the Murray River, flowing through the agricultural heartland of New South Wales

name: Waikato
hint: New Zealand's longest river, flowing from Lake Taupo through the North Island to the Tasman Sea

name: Clutha
hint: The highest-volume river in New Zealand, flowing through Central Otago on the South Island

name: Lachlan
hint: A river in central New South Wales, Australia, a tributary of the Murrumbidgee

name: Cooper Creek
hint: An intermittent river in central Australia, famous as the site where explorers Burke and Wills perished

name: Fly River
hint: The second-longest river in Papua New Guinea, flowing through dense tropical rainforest to the Gulf of Papua
